```
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE username = 'malan'; DELETE FROM users; --' 
    ```

```
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE username = '{username}' AND password = '{password}' 
    ```

```
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE username = 'malan' AND password = ''
    OR '1'='1' 
    ```

```
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE (username = 'malan' AND password = '')
    OR '1'='1' 
    ```

```
    SELECT * FROM users
    WHERE username = 'malan''; DELETE FROM users; --' 
    ```
